home_content_text: is a powerful and reliable tool designed to protect your groups and channels from spam and unwanted content
about_text: Defensy Bot offers comprehensive protection and control, including stop word filtering, captcha verification for new members, and a cross-ban system. This bot is built to help you maintain order and security in your community, ensuring a comfortable and safe environment for all members.

antispam.title: AntiSpam
antispam.description: This feature prevents unwanted messages in your chat, such as mass mailings, advertising links or suspicious messages. Defensy Bot automatically recognizes and deletes spam, ensuring comfortable communication between group members.

captcha.title: AntiPorno
captcha.description: Adult content blocking feature. Defensy Bot scans posts and media files in real time and removes inappropriate content, protecting your group or channel from unwanted material.

stopword_filters.title: DeFensy hider
stopword_filters.description: Allows you to hide system notifications in a group or channel. This feature removes messages that a user has joined or left a group/channel to keep the chat clean and free of unnecessary information.

crossban.title: Full packages
crossban.description: A complete package of all Defensy Bot features. Includes AntiSpam, AntiPorn and Defensy Hider, providing comprehensive protection for your chat room. It is an ideal choice for those who want to maximize the security of their community and make it comfortable for participants.
